rows.label: bf03130150_0010
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]gasp at the sight of the weird miasma

rows.label: bf03130150_0020
rows.name:
First time seeing it?
This is ether miasma.

rows.label: bf03130150_0040
rows.name:
It's toxins leaking from the Divine Beast's 
body. In other words, waste products.

rows.label: bf03130150_0050
rows.name:
You know how we sweat?
It's something like that.

rows.label: bf03130150_0060
rows.name: Erm, is there a way through this thing?

rows.label: bf03130150_0070
rows.name: I can't see any way round it.

rows.label: bf03130150_0120
rows.name:
That's about it.
Come on, let's move forward.
